!An occupational change means someone with certain abilities and experience gets promoted to a higher-level occupation. A Knight like yourself can change occupations to a *Paladin* or a *Dark Avenger*. Which occupation do you want to learn about? [npc_%objectId%_Link villagemaster/30109/09.htm|Paladin] [npc_%objectId%_Link villagemaster/30109/12.htm|Dark Avenger]Â
